A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was awful. If it didn’t have Star Wars in the title it may not have even made it into the cinemas - straight to DVD. Personally\, (spoiler) I cringed at the absurdity of a body being able to be blown into space but yet able to disregard instant solidification and come back alive. I realize it’s Sci-fi but even within the realm of fantasy I suspect many audiences are too sophisticated to banish all elements of reality within a story. I’m not surprised by the low audience score.
